name: The Cube (itch) (RomainVUARCHEX)
description:
The Cube is a short labyrinth game 

As the player, you have to escape from The Cube and find the 5 key who open the exit door, but you must be carefull about the ennemy and various obstacle.

This game is a student project make in three week, i hope you will enjoy it .

PC Controls

Arrows - Move 

Space bar - Jump

Credits

Romain Vuarchex
